attributes.action: Declare an extra bank holiday after removal of all legal social contact limits.
attributes.additional_details: The additional bank holiday weekend would provide family and friends with the chance to meet up, but additionally provide the hospitality industry with a much needed boost with a bumper weekend to help them boost their industry and persuade people get out and support the industry.
attributes.background: Following the publication of the roadmap out of lockdown today (February 22), and the fact that many family and friends will not have seen each other for over a year, we would like the Government to declare the Monday after the removal of all social contact limits as a bank holiday.
